statements: DELETE FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 101 AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM customer_profiles WHERE last_name = 'Smith' AND phone_number LIKE '%123%';
DELETE FROM customer_profiles WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01' AND preferences ->> 'category' = 'Fashion';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_dob < '1990-01-01' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM preferences WHERE pref_category = 'Preference Category A');
DELETE FROM customers WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE end_date < CURRENT_DATE();
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE preference_id IN (SELECT preference_id FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 1);
